Ham-Spin

Description

Ham-Spin is a boss rush action game featuring a hamster trapped inside a hamster ball trying to avoid becoming some cats' next meal. Without much of a choice, the hamster has to resort to weaponizing the ball in order to survive.

History

Ham-Spin was made for the Boss Rush Jam 2025 hosted on itchio. The theme of the jam was 'Spin'. I'd initially thought about making a 3D game, but decided to go full 2D for this particular game, just to see if I could pull it off. The art was entirely made using PowerPoint, with a 'low poly' kind of style (hard edges for the sprites). Each of the hamster's moving body parts is drawn separately and animated using bones in Unity. The result is a cute and cartoonish game that is also (deceptively) challenging. The current version only has cats as the bosses, but there are plans to expand the game to include more predators.

Features

  • A trapped but not necessarily helpless hamster.
  • Charging attack - Charge up that ball and spin to attack those pesky cats.
  • Boss fights - Face off against four different cats.
  • Optional 2P mode - It’s always more fun when you play with a buddy.

About WilKGames

About Us
WilKGames is a Brunei-based independent game development studio and creative initiative founded in 2021. Rooted in a passion for playful storytelling and community empowerment, WilKGames creates unique, accessible games that celebrate local culture and embrace bold, imaginative mechanics.
More information
More information on WilKGames, our logo & relevant media are available wilkgames.
